WebSQLService.Name: GetLocationNameDescService
WebSQLService.Statement: select TLNUM, TLNAME from CBSPARCMN5.TLTEL where SUBSTR(TLNUM, 1, 3) = 'CDM'

WebSQLService.Name: GetKQLogService
WebSQLService.Statement: select * from KQ where cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) > cast(cast( :startlimit as varchar(14)) as timestamp) and cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) <= (select current timestamp - 10 second from sysibm.sysdummy1) fetch first 500 rows only

WebSQLService.Name: GetKSLogService
WebSQLService.Statement: select * from KS where cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) > cast(cast( :startlimit as varchar(14)) as timestamp) and cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) <= (select current timestamp - 10 second from sysibm.sysdummy1) fetch first 500 rows only

WebSQLService.Name: GetRQLogService
WebSQLService.Statement: select * from RQ where cast(case length(cast( date_reqs as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) else cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_reqs as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) else cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) > cast(cast( :startlimit as varchar(14)) as timestamp) and cast(case length(cast( date_reqs as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) else cast(date_reqs as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_reqs as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) else cast(time_reqs as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) <= (select current timestamp - 10 second from sysibm.sysdummy1) fetch first 500 rows only

WebSQLService.Statement: select * from CX where cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) > cast(cast( :startlimit as varchar(14)) as timestamp) and cast(case length(cast( date_logd as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) else cast(date_logd as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_logd as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) else cast(time_logd as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) <= (select current timestamp - 10 second from sysibm.sysdummy1) fetch first 500 rows only

WebSQLService.Name: GetXSLogService
WebSQLService.Statement: select date_reqs, time_reqs, tims_reqs, date_resp, time_resp, tims_resp, remote_ip, remote_port, ref_conn, ref_reqs, ref_node, host_ref, host_sts, appl_ref, method, url, respcd, elps_all, elps_rqt, elps_rst, elps_tot, elps_wbt, elps_hst, elps_int, server_name from XS where cast(case length(cast( date_resp as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) else cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_resp as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) else cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) > cast(cast( :startlimit as varchar(14)) as timestamp) and cast(case length(cast( date_resp as varchar(8))) when 0 then '00000000' when 1 then '0000000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 2 then '000000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 3 then '00000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 4 then '0000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 5 then '000' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 6 then '00' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) when 7 then '0' || cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) else cast(date_resp as varchar(8)) end || case length(cast(time_resp as varchar(6))) when 0 then '000000' when 1 then '00000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 2 then '0000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 3 then '000' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 4 then '00' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) when 5 then '0' || cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) else cast(time_resp as varchar(6)) end as timestamp) <= (select current timestamp - 10 second from sysibm.sysdummy1) fetch first 500 rows only
